title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium] 3／22 4pm, 백승욱 (Lunit ／ 의장), ˝Conquering cancer through AI˝
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium] 3／22 4pm, 백승욱 (Lunit ／ 의장), ˝Conquering cancer through AI˝ date:2021-03-22T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=9613&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Speaker: 백승욱 (Lunit / 의장) Time: 16:00, Mar 22, 2021 Via Zoom due to COVID-19 ( Link: https ://bit.ly/3preatN ) Language: Korean Here is the talk's abstract and the speaker's short biography. Abstract Lunit thrives to push the boundaries of AI-powered capabilities for medical image analysis based on the world-leading deep learning technology specifically focused on cancer diagnosis. In this session, Anthony will talk about 1) how cancer can be conquered through AI technology, 2) successes and challenges in Lunit's eight-year journey, and 3) future prospects for medical AI in terms of technology and market. Bio Anthony is the co-founder, the chairman of the board, and the Chief Innovation Officer (CINO) of Lunit – one of the world’s leading artificial intelligence companies in the medical industry that helps physicians make more accurate cancer diagnoses. Today, he is responsible for developing and executing an integrated, long-term growth strategy for the company. Prior to working as the CINO, he was the founding CEO of Lunit. He led the company’s growth by adopting deep learning technology to the medical imaging analysis from 2014. He founded Lunit shortly after completing his Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering from KAIST. If you want to get more information about the colloquium, please refer to colloquium page: https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/colloquium/ . location:Abstract tag:csweb.calendar
